config_description: /** * Database setting REUSE_SPACE (default: true). * If disabled, all changes are appended to the database file, and existing * content is never overwritten. This setting has no effect if the database * is already open. */
developer_understanding_on_working: The REUSE_SPACE configuration option in the code determines whether changes are appended to the database file or if existing content is overwritten. If disabled, changes are appended, and existing content is not overwritten.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the REUSE_SPACE configuration option depends on the setting chosen by the user. If the option is changed, it will be triggered when the database is opened or when changes are made to the database.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the REUSE_SPACE configuration option on the system is significant. If disabled, it can lead to increased file size as changes are continuously appended to the database file without overwriting existing content. This can result in larger database files and potentially slower performance.
